participant_1.background:
I play with my dogs to help me feel younger.
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
My appearance is not as important to me as my performance.
I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show.
i have four cats.

participant_2.background:
My favorite people are my friends who I can drink coffee with and talk about anything.
I love a big bowl of chili after a long day of riding my bike.
I love working with my hands and getting to see the creative process through to completion.
i love cooking.
I have no need for a fortune teller; I know my future is bright.

content.text: Not so bad, thanks! I'm just working on some new music. What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing at home, enjoying a cup of coffee and some chili. What kind of music do you play?
I make all sorts of music, but I'm mostly into rock and roll. Do you like to cook?
I love to cook! I make a mean chili. I'm actually thinking about opening up a restaurant one day.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to open a restaurant too. What kind of food would you serve?
I'd probably serve a mix of American and Mexican food. I love both cuisines.
That sounds delicious! I'd definitely come to your restaurant.
Thanks! I'd love to have you!
